basicInformation.aboutMe: Hi, I'm Simon, seasoned Full Stack Web Developer with UI/UX design experience. My focus is building unique and engaging user experiences with the latest and greatest technologies. I believe in using the most appropriate tools, languages and frameworks to get things done. Currently, I am delving into devops and workflow automation and to that end, I have created 2 NPM packages that allow you to easily scaffold Python-based Full Stack Web applications.
basicInformation.aboutSite: The purpose of this site to showcase the my works as a Full Stack Developer.

sectionSummaries.description: Provides an overview of my IDE setup, preferred terminal emulator and other developer-related preferences.
Provides a collection of resources I have used to learn full stack web development and development in general.
Showcases the skills I have acquired over time and what they can potentially be used for.
Showcases the work that I have done in this program as well as in my professional career. This section will also include open-source projects that I have worked on.

skills.description: This section provides an overview of the skills, languages and frameworks and tools.
